snippet: Up to 2.4 million credit and debit cards used by customers at Schnucks grocery stores in four states may have been compromised over a three-month period.
abstract: Supermarket chain Schnucks says up to 2.4 million credit and debit cards used by customers at its grocery stores in four states may have been compromised over a three-month period.
lead_paragraph: Up to 2.4 million credit and debit cards used by customers at Schnucks grocery stores in four states may have been compromised over a three-month period.

headline.seo: Missouri: Grocery Chain Reports Credit Card Breach
headline.main: Missouri: Grocery Chain Reports Credit Card Breach
headline.print_headline: Missouri: Grocery Chain Reports Credit Card Breach
